Question: What roles do Dr. Ana Stelline and Niander Wallace have in relation to each other in *Blade Runner 2049*?
Options:
A. Dr. Ana Stelline is an employee of Niander Wallace.
B. Niander Wallace is a memory designer.
C. Dr. Ana Stelline creates memories for Niander Wallace.
D. Niander Wallace is the founder of the Wallace Corporation.
Answer: A) Dr. Ana Stelline is an employee of Niander Wallace., C) Dr. Ana Stelline creates memories for Niander Wallace., D) Niander Wallace is the founder of the Wallace Corporation.

Answer: A) Niander Wallace is the founder of the Wallace Corporation., B) Dr. Ana Stelline is a memory designer., D) Niander Wallace employs Dr. Ana Stelline.
